title: Too important for the blog...
content:
[http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/fontplay.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018061219/http:/www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/fontplay.html "http://www.planet-typography.com/news/typo/fontplay.html")

 [‹ Acrobat 8 comes with Minion and Myriad Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018061219/http:/typophile.com/node/36447 "Go to previous forum topic") [Mac vs. Windows text rendering revisited ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018061219/http:/typophile.com/node/36417 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fontplayer

comments.content:
Way to go Dennis! Planet Typographie has come into its own, right up there on a Google search for “typography”. I found Jean Christophe an amiable fellow who was a pleasure to work with.

Wishing you and Fontplay all the best for the days ahead. It can only get bigger and better.

j a m e s

<cite>Wishing you and Fontplay all the best for the days ahead.</cite>

Thank you. Jean was very nice. I had kind of forgotten about his request, having sent it quite a while ago, so it was a nice surprise to see the site “up in lights”, so to speak.

Living proof that with little training, and little talent, an old class clown can achieve resounding levels of mediocrity!  
; )
